SELECT VideoEntry.companyId, VideoEntry.groupId, VideoEntry.userId, VideoEntry.userName, VideoEntry.createDate, VideoEntry.modifiedDate,
VideoEntry.entryId, VideoEntry.name, VideoEntry.description, VideoEntry.videoType, VideoEntry.videoUrl, VideoEntry.videoFileId, VideoEntry.thumbnailImage, VideoEntry.thumbnailImageId
FROM VideoEntry
WHERE ((VideoEntry.name LIKE ?) OR (VideoEntry.videoUrl LIKE ?))
AND (VideoEntry.groupId = ?)
ORDER BY VideoEntry.createDate DESC

SELECT VideoEntry.companyId, VideoEntry.groupId, VideoEntry.userId, VideoEntry.userName, VideoEntry.createDate, VideoEntry.modifiedDate,
VideoEntry.entryId, VideoEntry.name, VideoEntry.description, VideoEntry.videoType, VideoEntry.videoUrl, VideoEntry.videoFileId, VideoEntry.thumbnailImage, VideoEntry.thumbnailImageId
FROM VideoEntry, VideoCategoryMap
WHERE (VideoCategoryMap.categoryId = ?)
AND (VideoEntry.groupId = ?)
AND (VideoCategoryMap.entryId = VideoEntry.entryId)
ORDER BY VideoEntry.createDate DESC
